item.title: Applet Directory
item.description:
Applet Store is the marketplace for the distribution of applets that are designed for use with the Akaun products. It allows the subscribers to the Akaun products to browse and install the applets. Some applets in the store are free of charge but some are charged for a required fee. Steps: Accept Marketplace Terms of Use > Install Applets > Open Applet Permission Settings of Applets: Create Permission Set > Create and Assign Role Personalization of Applets: Personalization of Applet

Need to find an Applet?

Search for an Applet true
